findings.quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% as of 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect figure. BLS data shows 2024 unemployment was around 4.1%, not 3.5%. Source: www.bls.gov/news.release/empsit.nr0.htm

findings.quote: Average hourly earnings increased by 4.1% year-over-year
findings.issue: Missing citation and timeframe. Should specify source (BLS Employment Cost Index) and exact period. Source: www.bls.gov/news.release/eci.nr0.htm

findings.quote: According to a recent Harvard study, remote work increases productivity by 13%
findings.issue: No Harvard study found with this claim. The 13% figure appears in general statistics but not from Harvard. Source search: hbr.org and hbs.edu

findings.quote: A 2023 meta-analysis found that meditation reduces anxiety by 30%
findings.issue: No 2023 meta-analysis found with 30% reduction claim. Studies show smaller effect sizes (0.22-0.38). Source: pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24395196

findings.quote: The US population is approximately 335 million
findings.issue: Outdated figure. Census Bureau shows 340.1 million as of July 2024. Source: www.census.gov/library/stories/2024/12/population-estimates.html

findings.quote: Life expectancy in the US is 76.4 years
findings.issue: This is 2021 data, not current. 2023 CDC data shows 78.4 years. Source: www.cdc.gov/nchs/products/databriefs/db521.htm
